title: qbook
text:
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book for the Advanced Data Science for Bio/Public Health/medical classes.


Prior programming experience, calculus, linear algebra, unix, python, R.

title: 2  Theory of grahpical display
text:
Carswell, C Melody. 1992. “Choosing Specifiers: An Evaluation of the Basic Tasks Model of Graphical Perception.” Human Factors 34 (5): 535–54.


Cleveland, William S. 1987. “Research in Statistical Graphics.” Journal of the American Statistical Association 82 (398): 419–23.


Cleveland, William S, and Susan J Devlin. 1980. “Calendar Effects in Monthly Time Series: Detection by Spectrum Analysis and Graphical Methods.” Journal of the American Statistical Association 75 (371): 487–96.


Cleveland, William S, and Robert McGill. 1984. “The Many Faces of a Scatterplot.” Journal of the American Statistical Association 79 (388): 807–22.


———. 1986. “An Experiment in Graphical Perception.” International Journal of Man-Machine Studies 25 (5): 491–500.
